title: My Google account has hacked my phone and am unable to regain correct settings and help.
content: I've seen multiple emails to app developers, spoke to MyVerizon and OnePlus, only to be reestablished under an amended liscene. My Google photo, drive and assistant all work to get my car and connection to my new phone. I don't even think this post will be returned to me safety with information I can trust. I'm completely out of ideas.
